towers.name: Packet Defender
towers.infoText: A simple tower that fires consistently and is great for early game usage. Cheap and effective for the beginning.

upgrades.description: Fire Rate & a little bit of Damage

towers.name: Firewall Node
towers.infoText: An AoE Tower, that is great for chokepoints, dealing moderate Damage to a lot of enemies. AoE Damage is in pulses.

towers.name: Malware Scanner
towers.infoText: A Sniper Turret that is slow firing but does lots of damage in a very long range. Can Crit in its base form.
